metadata.title: CVE-2024-24864 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/dvb-core indvbdmx_write() function. This can result in a null pointer dereferenceissue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of service issue.
